name: Pop Balloon
description:
Click on a crate to add a balloon.  Click on a balloon to pop it.  Get the crate to the target.

Note

If you get stuck on a level and would like to keep playing, you can use the O and P keys to cycle between levels.  Please let me know if you find a level too difficult to complete.

Credits

All code written and art made by WaveCollapse - itch.io.

Music made for the jam by jstenger95 - itch.io.

Sound effects obtained from the following sources:

Win Sound #2 | OpenGameArt.org

35 wooden cracks/hits/destructions | OpenGameArt.org

Freesound - "Party Pack, Balloons, Popping, 02-01.wav" by InspectorJ

Freesound - "Bounce" by JustInvoke
